title: ‘I Hope Things Improve’: Matteo Jorgenson Saving Visma in Key Primers for Flanders, Roubaix
content:
US star upright and on-form ahead of Dwars door Vlanderen title defense, Tour of Flanders as questions circle Van Aert: 'At E3 Classic we fell short. At Gent-Wevelgem we were unlucky.'

Read the full article at ‘I Hope Things Improve’: Matteo Jorgenson Saving Visma in Key Primers for Flanders, Roubaix on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
